title: how do i find a recording of a replay game?
body: title, i made a recording of me playing teemo and stacking 20 shrooms in a bush and baiting someone into it.  i cant find it tho...

replies.body:
Wow...that is truly savage!  Your replays can be found through your match history on the client.  You can save highlights of that moment!  Per the [Replays ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)Guide, you can find them in your documents directory.

C:\Users\\Documents\LeagueofLegends\Highlights

I hope that helps!
